articles.author: The Moscow Times
articles.title: Putin Opts Against Stricter Capital Controls Amid Ruble's Slide – Vedomosti - The Moscow Times
articles.description: Russia will not tighten capital controls in response to a weakening ruble, the Vedomosti business daily reported Thursday, citing two anonymous sources close to the Russian government.
articles.content:
Russia will not tighten capital controls in response to a weakening ruble, the Vedomosti business dailyreported Thursday, citing two anonymous sources close to the Russian government.
